text:
Confirming the news about Rodriguez's pregnancy, Ronaldo told a Spanish publication, "I am happy about what is coming."

Just few weeks after Cristiano Ronaldo was blessed with twins via a surrogate, the Real Madrid star is now all set to become father for the fourth time.

However, this time it is his girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez who is pregnant, reports the Marca.

Confirming the news about Rodriguez's pregnancy, Ronaldo told a Spanish publication, "I am happy about what is coming."

Earlier this month, the Portuguese became a father of twins via a surrogate mother and had left the Confederations Cup early to attend them.

Ronaldo also has a son, Cristiano Jr., who was born in 2010.
title: Baby No. 4 on way! Cristiano Ronaldo confirms girlfriend Georginas pregnancy
